text:
@realDonaldTrump STUDENTS & WORKERS BE SAFE!

We don’t know if it is safe to go back
to school or work without testing.

We do not have a federalized 
production and delivery of mass testing and PPE 
we will continue to see COVID-19 transmission 

SAFETY requires millions of test per week!
